original_text: Lowe's Q1 2021 Earnings Call Transcript Home-Improvement Retailers Raise the Roof Target, TJX Sales Surge as Shoppers Return Lowe's Q1 Earnings & Sales Beat on Strong Pro Business Target, Lowe’s, TJX Companies top Q1 estimates Lowe’s Charges Past Earnings Estimates. The Stock Drops.
